content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a furnace at position (x=60.0, y=-60.0) with fuel {'coal': 40} and status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Inserter 1 at position(x=60.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position (x=60.5, y=-61.5) with fuel {'coal': 47} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION.

### Inserter 2 at position(x=61.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position (x=61.5, y=-61.5) with fuel {'coal': 19} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Inserter 3 at position(x=62.5, y=-60.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position (x=62.5, y=-60.5) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Chest at position(x=62.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (x=62.5, y=-61.5) with an empty inventory.

### Offshore Pump at position(x=107.5, y=-33.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (x=107.5, y=-33.5) with a working status and connected pipes.

### Boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position (x=111.5, y=-32.0) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, connected to multiple pipes.

### Steam Engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (x=117.5, y=-30.5) with a not connected status and warnings for no input liquid and no fluid present in connections.

### Pipe Group 1 at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to the offshore pump and boiler, with a full output status.

### Pipe Group 2 at position(x=111.5, y=-33.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to the boiler and steam engine, with an empty status.

### Electricity Group at position(x=119.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of a small electric pole at position (x=119.5, y=-30.5) with a voltage of 0.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to connect pipes.
- Check that the pipe connections are valid and not blocked by other entities.

### Errors when using inserters
- Make sure the inserter has enough fuel to operate.
- Ensure that the inserter has a valid source and destination to pick up and drop items.

### Errors when using boilers and steam engines
- Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel to operate.
- Check that the steam engine has a valid input liquid and fluid connections.

### NAMESPACE
* Utility functions:
	+ connect_entities: connects two entities with a pipe.
	+ get_entity_position: gets the position of an entity.
	+ get_entity_status: gets the status of an entity.
* Important variables:
	+ entity_positions: a dictionary of entity positions.
	+ entity_statuses: a dictionary of entity statuses.
	+ pipe_connections: a list of pipe connections.
	+ fluid_systems: a list of fluid systems.
